website_summaries.verdict: This high-end brand provides a gentle cleanse that won't strip away all impurities, but will leave essential oils in place for a natural feel.
pros: The smell and feel of this product makes it worth its price
While at the high-end of price points, this cleanser provides results that are functional and appeal to the senses
cons: One may expect this product to do it all given the brand and price point

customer_reviews.title: Cleans and softens skin
customer_reviews.text: This face wash is good because it does not leave your skin dry by any means and cleanses well. The only thing, if you're looking for a cleanser and make-up remover, you will be disappointed. While the cleansing is good and the feel of your skin after use, it does not remove eye make-up well. I've had to use my regular soap to do the job, and then use the L'Occitan face wash.
customer_reviews.author: VET

customer_reviews.title: Great Face Soap
customer_reviews.text: I used this every morning before shaving. It really gets the oil off my face. But unlike soap, my skin is does not feel dry. I've been using this for 10 years. One bottle lasts me about 5-6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Ed OB

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and Effective Cleanser -- Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff -- I'm VERY impressed. I'm mid 50s and live in the Southern Arizonan Sonoran Desert. We have mostly clear, dry weather with a short Monsoon Season during the Summer months. This works great is the slightly more humid weather during Monsoon Season, as well as the dryer season the remainder of the year. It's gentle, yet very effective - including removing eye makeup. It's pretty much everything you could want in a cleanser -- and refillable! Love that. Would easily recommend this cleanser -- it's a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Laska

customer_reviews.title: Great easy cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Love loccitane. I have almost the full line of immortelle and wanted to continue adding the remaining products. This is light and fresh!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Eilyuk

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: I am hooked on this brand now. I bought a smaller kit that had travel sizes of some of the profits and knew I needed to get the large size and I did. This product is a light foam looks like whip cream, smells wonderful and super duper cleans well with no left over residue.
customer_reviews.author: Laura France

customer_reviews.title: Don’t settle - Use the best.
customer_reviews.text: This foaming face wash is mine, and my daughter’s favorite cleanser. It smells heavenly and leaves our skin so soft, clean and fresh. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Still (or again) love it
customer_reviews.text: I just love this cleansing foam. My husband had given it to me as part of a set (birthday gift!) a couple years ago; when I ran out I used other cleansers and never liked one as much as this, so I decided to buy it again -- and I'm not disappointed. I like the foaminess, it's very soft as you use it, and I like the smell. And it leaves my skin clean and soft but not slippery like some other cleansers that eave residue.
customer_reviews.author: Koda100

customer_reviews.title: CLEANS DEEP AND SKIN FEELS LIKE SILK
customer_reviews.text: I wash my face with this cleansing foam, for my particular skin type I have normal to oily skin, and it feels like it purifies my skin clean and deep down. I use a scrubby for the face with the foam. I back up the process with the cream for the face and eyes. These products turn your skin into smooth silk. It is wonderful and you feel younger when you face feels and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda L. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite face wash
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. I love everything about this face wash. Pleasant delicate aroma, one pump does the job and rinses easily, feeling cleansed and hydrated. I will buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: A REED

customer_reviews.title: Recommended product
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine recommended it, and it is a miracle. :-) Will never use anything else. I already ordered the refill pack. you really need a small amount to let your face clean properly. I use is also as makeup remover because I do not use much makeup mostly mascara. I like the smooth feeling when washing my face with it
customer_reviews.author: Miszisz Miszisz

customer_reviews.title: love it, Very soft on the skin but cleans ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this face wash for years, love it, Very soft on the skin but cleans deeply and removes make up very well, even mascara (I use non-waterproof). It also lasts very long one or 2 pumps are enough. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: B.R.

customer_reviews.title: you only need a little and it is theeee best facial cleaner I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is so lite weight, you only need a little and it is theeee best facial cleaner I have ever used. Wouldn't be without it! A little bit goes a very long ways which makes it very affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Linda K Evenrude

customer_reviews.title: Addictive fragrance for an older bachelor, .. better than sex ..
customer_reviews.text: Addictive fragrance for an older bachelor, .. at times, better than sex ..
customer_reviews.author: Lamar

customer_reviews.title: Great foam face wash
customer_reviews.text: I first found this product when it was given to me as a sample. I loved it and being a foam cleanser is great.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Gentle to the skin
customer_reviews.text: It is not cheap, but it lasts long. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jayaram Krishnaswamy

customer_reviews.title: ... own cleansers and after-cleanser products and this is the best cleanser I've found
customer_reviews.text: I make my own cleansers and after-cleanser products and this is the best cleanser I've found! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: enaJ

customer_reviews.title: 180 uses per bottle
customer_reviews.text: It lasts a good long time. It works fast and rinses fast. The scent is nice, and I have clear skin when I use it once daily.
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood F1

customer_reviews.title: The real deal
customer_reviews.text: It's gentle, effective and makes me feel like I'm at a spa for a couple of minutes during my chaotic life with 3 boys under age 7.
customer_reviews.author: Shellathon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Removes makeup extremely good however as my skin is aging not very moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: RMCREE

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Just not worth it, drying, smells good but breaks me out if I use it too much
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Agnello

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommended
customer_reviews.text: I have been problems with my skin and finally I got the right product. I really recommended it. And smell amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Aguiriano

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this product every night to clean my face
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use, just press and foam comes out, as much as you like. Smell is slightly herbal, fresh and pleasing. It cleans makeup which is nice. And It leaves my skin soft.
customer_reviews.author: CherylY

customer_reviews.title: Always a great face wash
customer_reviews.text: Always a great face wash. My mom and I both use it and when we run out our skin starts breaking out. Definite NEED
customer_reviews.author: jennie

customer_reviews.title: Unsealed and Unhappy.
customer_reviews.text: When I received the product it was not sealed, the cap was off and the contents was not full.
customer_reviews.author: Nanette

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth It
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. My face cleared up within a few days. I also noticed that my skin does not have random dry patches and is less oily. This product also smells wonderful. Definitely will purchase again.b
customer_reviews.author: Scott E. Hotsauce

customer_reviews.title: The foaming sensation is nice, no issues here
customer_reviews.text: I use it occasionally. The foaming sensation is nice, no issues here. I give this five stars primarily because my wife loves this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delivered on the road!
customer_reviews.text: This is an example of how good things work at amazon. I was on the road and ran out of my facial wash. I ordered this via prime and had it the next day!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: I've used this delicious foaming cleanser for forever. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used this delicious foaming cleanser for forever. I actually look forward to washing my face. It's smooth as silk and your face feels so clean. Follow with L'Occitane toner.
customer_reviews.author: melissa buechel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A light facial soap - perfect for a quick wash and rinse.
customer_reviews.author: Hello323

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I don't dislike it but I won't be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I have used it for several years and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Allison

customer_reviews.title: and smells nice.
customer_reviews.text: Gentle, cleans off makeup, doesn't seem to strip my skin, and smells nice.
customer_reviews.author: KristyB.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lovely product and easy to use. Non drying and face is left soft
customer_reviews.author: kisha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Which is was a little less expensive! Worth it though.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this product leaves my skin feeling. It's worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth H

customer_reviews.title: Works well but the fragrance is stinky!
customer_reviews.text: I think this face cleanser is a really good product, but I absolutely hate the smell. It smells like carnations, the flower, with a acrid, almost moldy smell. I still gave this 5 stars, as it works very well and leaves my face feeling moisturized. I wish they would change the fragrance to something other than what it is. The rest of the products smell the same way and I will not order more of this due to the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Texassews

customer_reviews.title: Great Products
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived conveniently and saved me time. I will use again.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Rawls

customer_reviews.title: I otherwise love the product but am disappointed to have it arrive ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift for someone and when I received it the lid was missing. I attempted to exchange it for another one and the new one also arrived without a lid. I don't know if these are truly new to not have a top. I otherwise love the product but am disappointed to have it arrive not complete and ready to give as a gift. I will only buy this brand from the manufacturer from now on. It's the same price.
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: This is excellent. And
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent. And, refillable. I am glad it's sold on Amazon. The closest L'Occitane store is about 15 miles away. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Hilda

customer_reviews.title: Sending it back, authentic product?
customer_reviews.text: This was sent to me exactly as pictured. I was able to lift the cap, unscrew the pump and there the liquid was in the bottle. It could have been anything in there. Customer service was awesome about sending it back for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Holy Goodness
customer_reviews.text: Um...wow. all I can say is....this stuff makes me want to wash my face. Repeatedly. And for a long time. In fact, I can't wait to wash my face. I will not use another face wash ever. It smells like holy goodness and feels like angel butts....if angel butts were foamy and if they even have butts.
customer_reviews.author: BeachyKeen

product_meta.title: L'Occitane Immortelle Precious Cleansing Foam, 5.1 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
Rich and velvety, precious Cleanser is a smooth, easily absorbed antiaging treatment. Immortelle essential oil is concentrated into microcapsules for controlled, 24-hour release.

BRAND STORY
By L'Occitane

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
